long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We all need a moment of mindfulness amidst the hustle and bustle of our daily lives. Remembrance is an extension that is meant to achieve that mindfulness through sending you notifications to recite short Islamic prayers in one hour increments throughout your day. Each hour brings a different prayer and each prayer brings a different blessing. Through these remembrances of God, the intent is to help individuals achieve serenity in their days.
